description:
A marvel of modernity

A small, handy musical instrument that you can take anywhere you want – the first piano for your kid. Let your children explore sounds.

An educational value

Music develops memory and improves motor skills and concentration. With its total power, you will awaken your child's creativity and sensitivity to beauty.


Key features:

— Tuned for kids 
— Unprecedented ease of use
— Free play mode
name: Piano for kids
